| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | [monst.c#line3179](/wiki/Monst.c#line3179 "Monst.c") |

The **Ninja** is a [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") in *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")* that is notable as the only non-unique, non-randomly-generated hostile monsters to appear on a [Quest](/wiki/Quest "Quest").

## Generation

They appear only during the [Samurai quest](/wiki/Samurai_quest "Samurai quest"), and are generated on the home level, the Shogun's castle, and the keep of the [quest nemesis](/wiki/Quest_nemesis "Quest nemesis"), [Ashikaga Takauji](/wiki/Ashikaga_Takauji "Ashikaga Takauji").

As of [NetHack 3.6.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.6.0 "NetHack 3.6.0"), ninjas are generated with 6-11 [shuriken](/wiki/Shuriken "Shuriken") (75% chance) or [darts](/wiki/Darts "Darts") (25% chance), and a [short sword](/wiki/Short_sword "Short sword") (75% chance) or axe (25% chance) as their main weapon.

## Strategy

They are an excellent source of the otherwise extremely rare shuriken for samurai.

## History

There was once a [Ninja role](/wiki/Ninja_\(role\) "Ninja (role)"), which was replaced by the Rogue role from [NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0") on.

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.4. Click here for more information.](/images/3/37/Nh364-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.4. Click here for more information.")

**This page may need to be updated for the [current version](/wiki/Current_version "Current version") of *NetHack*.**

It may contain text specific to [NetHack 3.6.4](/wiki/NetHack_3.6.4 "NetHack 3.6.4"). Information on this page may be out of date.

**Editors:** After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-364}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.
html:
Ninja

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
For the Samurai class title, see Samurai.
Wikipedia has an article about:
Ninja
@ ninja
Difficulty 7
Attacks Weapon 1d8, weapon 1d8
@ ninja
Difficulty 7
Attacks

Weapon 1d8, weapon 1d8

Base level 5
Base experience 66
Speed 12
Base AC 10
Base MR 10
Alignment 3 (lawful)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size Medium
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed None

A ninja:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a human.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can be seen through infravision.
Reference monst.c#line3179

The Ninja is a monster in NetHack that is notable as the only non-unique, non-randomly-generated hostile monsters to appear on a Quest.

Generation

They appear only during the Samurai quest, and are generated on the home level, the Shogun's castle, and the keep of the quest nemesis, Ashikaga Takauji.

As of NetHack 3.6.0, ninjas are generated with 6-11 shuriken (75% chance) or darts (25% chance), and a short sword (75% chance) or axe (25% chance) as their main weapon.

Strategy

They are an excellent source of the otherwise extremely rare shuriken for samurai.

History

There was once a Ninja role, which was replaced by the Rogue role from NetHack 3.0.0 on.

This page may need to be updated for the current version of NetHack.

It may contain text specific to NetHack 3.6.4. Information on this page may be out of date.

Editors: After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-364}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.

The '''Ninja''' is a [[monster]] in ''[[NetHack]]'' that is notable as the only non-unique, non-randomly-generated hostile monsters to appear on a [[Quest]].

==Generation==

They appear only during the [[Samurai quest]], and are generated on the home level, the Shogun's castle, and the keep of the [[quest nemesis]], [[Ashikaga Takauji]].

As of [[NetHack 3.6.0]], ninjas are generated with 6-11 [[shuriken]] (75% chance) or [[darts]] (25% chance), and a [[short sword]] (75% chance) or axe (25% chance) as their main weapon.

==Strategy==

They are an excellent source of the otherwise extremely rare shuriken for samurai.

==History==

There was once a [[Ninja (role)|Ninja role]], which was replaced by the Rogue role from [[NetHack 3.0.0]] on.
